activities: Conenza, through member registration and profile information collects personal information.  This information is used for marketing purposes and member to member communications as discribed in our privacy policy.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, Customer and Member data.  Yes, this includes manually processed data.
recoursemech: Conenza has partnered with TRUSTe as an independent recourse mechanism.
